CustomField.description: The type of reCAPTCHA to use. Valid values: V2_Checkbox (shows "I'm not a robot" checkbox), V2_Invisible (triggers on submit with possible challenge), V3_Score (runs in background with score-based verification).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the reCAPTCHA type: V2_Checkbox, V2_Invisible, or V3_Score
CustomField.label: Captcha Type
